name: SHMUP 50
description:
SHMUP50 is a short, top-down, 2D shooter built with LÖVE (pun intended) as my final project for Harvard's CS50G course over on edX.

Destroy enemy ships and absorb like color bullets while dodging others.  Deal 2x damage to enemy ships with opposite color bullets. Increase your score and multiplier by destroying three of the same color ships in a row to create chains.  

Controls Move ↑, ↓, ←, →Fire spaceColor SwitchcPause pQuit escSelect Title Option
Return to Titleenter
